forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 53. West southwest wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 66. West southwest wind 5 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
As the dawn begins to break along the vibrant hills of San Francisco, a subtle charm envelops the city. The air is cool, hinting at the remnants of the marine layer that often sweeps over this coastal haven. In the early hours, temperatures linger around 53 degrees, offering a gentle reminder to don a light jacket as you embark upon your day. The west-southwest winds whisper softly, barely rustling the leaves but promising a lively reality in the hours ahead. 

Come afternoon, expect the sun to embrace the skyline, ushering in a delightful warm spell with temperatures lofting into the mid-60s. The promise of clear skies invites you to relish in the full expanse of sunshine. Yet, do not underestimate the breeze that may dance around you, invigorating your steps while keeping you alert to the nuances of the day. Ideal attire might blend comfort and style—perhaps a fitted sweater over lightweight layers, perfect for transitioning from the cool morning to the bask of midday. With such pleasant conditions, consider a leisurely stroll along the waterfront, or perhaps explore the intricacies of a local café—both simple pursuits that are richly rewarding, offering opportunities to savor the city’s rhythm in this moment.
